text:
NATIONAL ASSOCIATION OF EDUCATIONAL BROADCASTERS
lU Gregory Hall
Urbana, Illinois
To: Professional Advancement Committee:
Earl Wynn Harry Lamb
Vernon Bronson Donley Feddersen
^ R. Edwin Browne <^Carl Manser
James Day <- Robert Schenkkan
-and-
Finance Committee:
William Harley Frank Schooley
Richard Hull Robert Schenkkan
James Miles
From: H. J. Skomia
Date: January 5, 191
Attached in (very obviously!) rough draft form, for your comments
and reactions, is a first effort at the request we are to have in
Kellogg9s hands February 1. Your reactions and suggestions are
earnestly invited*
Members of the Professional Advancement Committee will also receive,
herewith, our (earlier) request to Kellogg and the additional data
recently supplied at Dr. Seayas request, to supplement it.
